dcterms:description: A dataset created for plausible object placement, consisting of composite images generated from the Cityscapes dataset, with human-annotated plausibility labels for training and testing.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes-OP dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset specifically designed for assessing object placement, containing images annotated with positive and negative rationality labels indicating plausible object placements.
dcterms:title: OPA dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic urban scene understanding, widely used for training and evaluating object placement methods.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of common objects in context, used for various computer vision tasks including object detection and segmentation.
